name: Kit Harington

structured_info.background: Kit Harington is an English actor and a graduate of the Royal Central School of Speech & Drama. He has experience in stage productions including *War Horse*, *Doctor Faustus*, and *True West*.

summary: Kit Harington is an English actor renowned for his portrayal of Jon Snow in *Game of Thrones*. He has a background in both stage and television acting, culminating in his prominent role in the HBO series.

name: Robert Catesby

structured_info.background: Robert Catesby was the key leader behind the Gunpowder Plot of 1605, a failed attempt to assassinate King James I.

summary: Robert Catesby was a 17th-century historical figure best known for orchestrating the Gunpowder Plot. He is also noted as an ancestor of actor Kit Harington.

name: Sir David Harington

structured_info.background: Sir David Harington was a businessman and baronet with familial ties to Henry Dundas, 1st Viscount Melville, a Scottish politician.

summary: Sir David Harington was a baronet and businessman who is noted as an ancestor and for his family connection to the Scottish politician Henry Dundas, 1st Viscount Melville.

name: Henry Dundas, 1st Viscount Melville

structured_info.background: A Scottish politician with a familial connection to the father of actor Kit Harington.

summary: Henry Dundas, 1st Viscount Melville, was a Scottish politician. He is noted for a family link to Kit Harington's father.

name: Ben Whishaw

structured_info.background: Ben Whishaw is an actor known for inspiring Kit Harington to pursue a career in drama.

summary: Ben Whishaw is a noteworthy actor who has influenced other performers, including Kit Harington, to enter the field of dramatic arts.
